publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2522 Mr Andy Kerr: Water Industry (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution-That the Parliament for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Water Industry (Scotland) Bill, agrees to- (a) the expenditure out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund of the expenses of the Scottish Ministers in consequence of the Act; and (b) any charge imposed on, and any payment required to be made by, any person by or under the Act. Supported by: Ross Finnie*, Allan Wilson*, Peter Peacock*
